welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Tibigan, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our vibrant culture and stunning surroundings. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tagbilaran Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Mactan-Cebu International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Mactan-Cebu International Airport, dedicated solely for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Mactan-Cebu International Airport, serving all domestic flights within the Philippines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
